Paragraph: After 10 days of treatment , he developed acute renal failure that was completely reversible after complete remission of APL was achieved and therapy discontinued .

Sure! Here are the "Chemical" entities in the paragraph:

1. APL (Acute Promyelocytic Leukemia) - a chemical entity because it is a disease characterized by an abnormal proliferation of immature white blood cells.
2. Therapy - a chemical entity because it refers to the use of chemical substances, such as drugs, to treat a disease.
